entry.title: Some people framing ETH POW as an airdrop. It's not. Our advise to you: don't touch ETH POW or you'll get rekt.
entry.summary: Some people framing ETH POW as an airdrop. It's not. Our advise to you: don't touch ETH POW or you'll get rekt. Robert Leshner:â€‚The Ethereum merge (switch to proof of stake from proof of work) is a few weeks out. For most folks in the Ethereum community, this is maybe the most meaningful event of the past five years. Some advice for beginners (and experts):

entry.title: Re which they'll start distributing to vault users. Before you deposit make sure you understand the strategies involved and what market views you impl...
entry.summary: Re which they'll start distributing to vault users. Before you deposit make sure you understand the strategies involved and what market views you implicitly express by depositing. E.g Covered Call vault does well in bear, crab market or slow grind up but loses $ETH in sudden jump
